mapper.insert: insert into LIKES(LIKENO , BNUM , MEMBERID) values((SELECT NVL(MAX(LIKENO), 0) + 1 FROM LIKES) ,#{bnum} ,#{memberid})
mapper.delete: delete from LIKES where BNUM = #{bnum} and MEMBERID = #{memberid}
mapper.update: update LIKES set LIKECHECK = 1 where BNUM = #{bnum} and MEMBERID = #{memberid}
update LIKES set LIKECHECK = 0 where BNUM = #{bnum} and MEMBERID = #{memberid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from LIKES where BNUM = #{bnum} and MEMBERID = #{memberid}
